full_threads.body:
Good evening,

Following on from my email earlier tonight, please find following text changes for the website. Again, I hope it all makes sense. I have included images to include under the page/ section it is to go on.

Homepage additional text

DON'T SWEAT IT is a 360 degree solution to make your workplace peri/menopause friendly. We have created a world first online education course for all staff members. In addition we offer webinars and workshops, menopause policy development, retreats and peri/menopause executive health checks.

WORKSHOPS AND WEBINARS

Dr Ginni and Shelly can hold workshops in person or host a webinar online. Below is a sample of topics, but feel free to add your own. There's nothing about peri and menopause we won't cover!

  • Menopause at Work Basics
  • Menopause refresher
  • Is this Menopause and how can I be sure?
  • How to beat brain fog!
  • How workplaces can help peri and menopausal women
  • Confidence and mood fixes for peri and menopause depression
  • Pouring cold water on hot flushes
  • How to make uncomfortable conversations easy
  • Tackling peri and menopause insomnia
  • Newsflash - peri and menopause is not just in the workplace

MENOPAUSE WORKPLACE POLICY

Is your workplace menopause friendly? Does it have a menopause policy? We can consult to help you get your menopause policy up and running, ensuring it is fit for purpose and up to date with best practice thinking. We also have a team of employment lawyers who can create for you from scratch.


MENOPAUSE EXECUTIVE HEALTH CHECKS*

Looking for targeted peri/menopause-specific guidance and advice? Dr Ginni, author of The M Word is standing by to take you through a 60-90 minute menopause health check. All your personalised advice is delivered in a beautiful, easy-to-read document.

*Available to Corporate with a Conscience customers only

DON'T SWEAT IT RETREATS

An immersive experience in a beautiful location to get time out plus knowledge and inspiration to ensure that your menopause chapter becomes the time of your life! We run luxury retreats hosted by Dr Ginni and Shelly with workshops, lots of new knowledge plus tons of laughs, great food and wine, new memories and connections and plenty of relaxation.


Services drop downs

Don't Sweat It - the online course

In a world first, Dr Ginni and Shelly have created a quick, fun yet info-packed online course to get you peri/menopause-aware in one simple hour. Based entirely in science, solutions focused, positive and uplifting, this course is a MUST for workplaces looking to get the entire team menopause-aware. Relax, it's 100% ick-free.


Peri/Menopause Executive Health Checks

OK, so you are ready to admit that menopause is wreaking havoc with your work life and confidence, but what next? General information is great but how do you work out how to turn the ship around?

Dr Ginni, author of best selling menopause bible, The M Word is here to help! We provide a totally confidential one on one 60-90 minute virtual menopause health check aimed at creating a personalised set of recommendations. All of these address your specific concerns and symptoms and are based on the solutions you WANT! All your personalised advice is delivered in a beautiful, easy-to-read document that you can feel free to share with your doctor.

Price $750

Available to Corporate with a Conscience customers only


Click to enquire






Develop your workplace peri/menopause policy

Employees who go through peri/menopause in the workplace will almost invariably be dealing with this life-altering event on their own.

A peri/menopause workplace policy can help change this, make employees feel supported and valued. It creates a culture of inclusivity, diversity and equality.

It also helps retain staff and reduce recruitment costs.

In our increasingly litigious society a peri/menopause policy can also assist combat the increasing number of claims for menopause-related discrimination and unfair dismissal cases.

Dr Ginni, Shelly and their employment legal team have done the international research to develop peri and menopause workplace policies. The two-page document will be tailored specifically to your organisation.

Fee $2000 +GST

We also suggest:
  • A revision of this policy every two years
  • A one-page advice paper for the board






Webinars and workshops

BONUS FREE webinar!!

CARING FOR YOUR SKIN IN MIDLIFE!

If you've reached 40 odd and realised that completely neglecting your skin is paying you some pretty negative dividends, you're not alone. The effects of UV radiation compound ageing and menopause just makes it worse. Dryer, itchier and more sensitive skin is one thing. Fine lines, wrinkles and pigmentation aren't much fun either., Luckily there is so much you can do to help!

In this webinar we address;

*What is happening to your skin and is it sun, age or hormones?

*Let's cut through the rubbish. What really works when it comes to combating skin ageing?

*How do you prevent further damage? (Hint sunscreen is NOT just for beach days)

What's included;

*A 30-minute online presentation with 15 minutes for Q&A - both live and pre- submitted anonymous

*Free evidence based quality skincare samples for everyone participating

*Absolutely FREE to schedule this webinar with any 2 webinars or workshops



Don't Sweat It Retreats

Perimenopause and menopause can be a lonely time for women, so let's connect. Our Don't Sweat It retreats are designed to empower and inspire you. Based entirely on the latest up-to-date science, our info packed sessions address all aspects of menopause and how to get the most of this phase of life. It will be filled with laughing and learning.

Our retreats, led by Shelly and Dr Ginni are a safe space to relax, unwind, share, learn, laugh and grow.

Day 1

​

  • 1pm Arrive at our retreat location
  • 1pm - 2pm Welcome lunch and a chance to meet your hosts

  • 2pm - 4pm Workshops 1 and 2

The science of hot flushes- what is happening to your body and how to combat it.

Mental health in menopause- the science behind it and how to manage it

Q and A with Ginni and Shelly

  • 4-6pm free time
  • 6pm wine and cheese

  • 7pm Dinner at our restaurant with bonus wine appreciation talk

​

Day 2

​

  • 7am - 8:15am tai chi for beginners
  • 9am - 9:30am Nourishing breakfast
  • 9:30am - 11am Workshop 3 sleeping like a champion. Reclaiming your nights in menopause

  • Workshop 4 Brain fog- what it is and how to beat it

1:15pm - 2pm Light lunch

  • 2:30pm - 4pm Workshop 5 secret women's business- a workshop that strays below the belt. Q&A with Shelly and Dr Ginni
  • 4- 6pm free time group walk spa treatments (extra cost)

  • 6pm Retreat Group Dinner with bonus dressing for midlife workshop and fashion show

​

Day 3

​

  • 7am - 8:15am Tai Chi
  • 9am - 10am Nourishing breakfast
  • 10am - 11;30am Debrief, photos and sharing
  • 12noon Farewell & check out

NB this is a sample program. Schedules may vary depending on selected retreat dates.

2 IMAGES FOR RETREATS PAGE - is it possible for the word "RETREATS" to go in the centre of the 2 groups of people below.





Thanks so much.


Warm regards,


Alicia Galea
Operations Manager
Don't Sweat It -
Menopause in the Workplace
Mobile 0414 534 668
Email alicia@dontsweatit.com.au
http://dontsweatit.com.au
